entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 2:00 PM ADT Monday 27 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
